abstract: A blank 3D graphical calculator for general use.
---

```{r, setup, include = FALSE}
library("webexercises")
```


<div id="calculator3d" style="width: 100%; height: 500px;"></div>

<script>
  const elt3d = document.getElementById('calculator3d');
  const calculator3d = Desmos.Calculator3D(elt3d);
  calculator3d.setMathBounds({xMin: -10, xMax: 10, yMin: -10, yMax: 10, zMin: 10, zMax: 10});
  calculator3d.setExpression({ id: "n0", type: "text", text: 'This is a blank 3D graphical calculator for you to enter anything you want! Click the X to delete this message, and click on the expression below to edit.'});
  calculator3d.setExpression({id: 'surface', latex: 'z=x^2 + y^2', color: '#3F68B6'});
</script>
